messages.content: you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nchifukwa chanji akagwilira amamangidwa amuna wokha

Chapter:4,Section:20, Amuna ndi akazi onse amamangidwa malingana ndi mlandu, kutengela ndi Section 20, Chapter 4 cha Buku la Malamulo a Malawi, lomwe limaletsa kusankhana pa kugwiritsa ntchito malamulo, ndipo onse ayenera kukhala ndi mlandu ofanana.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kuchosa amaudindo ngati sakukwanisa ntchito

Chapter:10, Section: 198, Anthu amachotsedwa ngati sakukwanitsa udindo wawo, Section 198, Chapter 10 cha Constitution, chimafotokoza malamulo oti anthu ogwira ntchito m'boma kapena m'mabungwe azichotsedwa ngati sakuchita bwino kapena achita zachinyengo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
nchito zina zilibe leave bwanji

Chapter: 4, Section 31, Malamulo amapereka ufulu wa leave kwa ogwira ntchito onse, kutengela ndi Section 31, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, limene limapereka ufulu wogwira ntchito kukhala ndi maholide kapena leave monga Section la ufulu wa ntchito.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
banja likatha koma nkazi sanapange nawo contribute zinthu koma amatengako gawo laachuma, ndimafuna ndiziwe chifukwa

Chapter: 4, Section:24, Malamulo amateteza nkazi ngakhale sanapange contribute, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4 cha Constitution ya Malawi, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti nkazi ali ndi ufulu m'banja ngakhale sanapereke gawo lake la ndalama, komanso akuyenera kulandiridwa mopanda tsankho.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
wotiyimila samabwelesa chitukuko kumadera, malamulo amakamba chani

Chapter: 6, Section: 8, Nyumba ya Malamulo imayenera kuyimila anthu bwino, kutengela ndi ndondomeko za Chapter 6, Section 8, imene imayikira patsogolo kuyimilira nzika zonse mogwirizana ndi zofuna zawo ndikutsatira ulamuliro wa malamulo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ndimafuna ndiziwe malamulo

Chapter: 4, Section: 44, Constitution ya Malawi imakamba za ufulu wanu, mu Section 44, Chapter 4, mumanena kuti ufulu uliwonse womwe nzika ili nawo uyenera kutetezedwa ndpo suyenela kuikidwa pansi pa malamulo ena.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mazisogoleri sabwelesa chitukuko kumuzi, titani

Chapter: 6, Section :8, Anthu amatha kufunsa mafunso ku Nyumba ya Malamulo, malinga ndi Section 8, Chapter 6, imene imawona kuti nzika zonse zili ndi ufulu wofunsa malamulo ndi zofuna za boma kudzera mwa oyimilira awo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ana asikana sakupitiliza maphunziro chifukwa chamabanja achangu

Chapter: 3, Section:13, Ana onse ayenera kumaliza sukulu, izi zili mu Section 13, Chapter 3 cha Constitution, komwe kumatchula kuti boma liyenera kupereka maphunziro kwa ana onse mpaka kukwaniritsa zofunikira zawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ufulu wa anthu achikulire

Chapter: 3, Section: 30(b) Anthu achikulire ali ndi ufulu wa chitetezo, kutengela ndi Section 13(b), Chapter 3, lomwe limatsindika kuti boma liyenera kusamalira anthu achikulire powapatsa chitetezo ndi zothandiza pamoyo wawo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
funa kudziwa za ufulu wanga

Chapter: 4, Section: 44, Ufulu wanu uli mu Constitution ya Malawi, malinga ndi Section 44, Chapter 4, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti ufulu uliwonse womwe constitution imapereka uyenera kutetezedwa mogwirizana ndi malamulo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
chilango cha munthu wagwilira chimati chani

Chapter: 15, section: 137, Chilango cha munthu ogwilira ndi zaka 14, kutengela ndi Section 137, Chapter 15, lomwe limapereka malamulo okhwima pa milandu yokhudza kugwilira komanso kuphwanya ufulu wa ena.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
mafuna kudziwa dza ufulu wathu opanga ma demo

Chapter: 4, Section 38, Malamulo amalola ma demo mwa mtendere, malinga ndi Section 38, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa anthu kusonkhana ndikupanga ma demo popanda kuphwanya mtendere.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amathandiza bwanji azimayi omwe achitidwa nkhanza kubanja

Chapter: 4, Section: 24, Constitution imateteza azimayi ku nkhanza, izi zili mu Section 24, Chapter 4, lomwe limatsimikizira kuti akazi ali ndi ufulu wofanana ndi amuna ndipo ayenera kutetezedwa ku nkhanza za m'banja.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
malamulo amati chani kwa amene tagulisidwa malo mobeledwa kapena mwachinyengo

Chapter: 4, Section: 24, Malamulo amakulolani kudzafuna chilungamo ku khoti, kutengela ndi Section 41, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, limene limatsimikizira kuti aliyense ali ndi ufulu wopeza chilungamo kudzera m'khoti popanda ziletso.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
a city akutolela ndalama mmakomo koma ife chitukuko sitikuchiona, malamulo angatithandize bwanji

Chapter: 14, Section: 146, Ndondomeko za city council zili ndi ulamuliro wa nyumba za malamulo, izi zikukhudzana ndi Section 146, Chapter 14, komwe malamulo a nyumba za boma amasamalira ndondomeko za chitukuko kumidzi ndi m'matauni.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ndimafuna kudziwa za malamulo a mdziko lino

Chapter: 1, Section: 5, Constitution ndi ndondomeko zazikulu za malamulo, izi zili mu Section 5, Chapter 1 cha Constitution, chomwe chimakhazikitsa Constitution ngati gwero lalikulu la malamulo a dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi ovlaza nzake pauchifwamba, naye ali ndi ufulu wokhala ndi moyo

Chapter:4, Section: 16, Ali ndi ufulu wokhala ndi moyo ngakhale atakhala ndi mulandu, malinga ndi Section 16, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa moyo kwa aliyense osalola kugwidwa popanda chilungamo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
ndi udindo wanji omwe ndili nawo ngati nzika ya malawi muno

Chapter: 4, Section: 44, Ndinu ndi udindo wotsatira malamulo ndi kuteteza dziko, kutengela ndi Section 44, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limatchula udindo wa nzika kutsatira malamulo ndikuchita zofuna za dziko.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi tingakadandaule kuti ngati a mp athu sakupanga zomwe adalonjeza

Chapter: 6, Section: 8, Mungadandaule ku Nyumba ya Malamulo kapena mabungwe ena a boma, izi zili mu Section 8, Chapter 6 cha Constitution, limene limapereka njira zomveka za kukonzekera ndondomeko ndi kupereka madandaulo.

you are a helpful assistant that answers question from user from chichewa constitution of malawi in the form Chapter:<constitution_chapter>,Section:<costitution_section>, <answer_from_chichewa_constititution>
kodi malamulo a mziko lino amati chani pankhani yachipembezo

Chapter: 4, Section: 33, Ufulu wolambira chipembedzo uli ndi chitetezo, kutengela ndi Section 33, Chapter 4 cha Constitution, lomwe limapereka ufulu wa munthu aliyense kusankha chipembedzo komanso kulambiramo momasuka.
